verdict.name: Verdict
verdict.description: Deals <dmg>476 damage</dmg> to the enemy and knocks them down

chastise.name: Chastise
chastise.description:
Deals 235 damage to the enemy.

If the enemy is already affected by the Divine Punishment or Smash effects, other nearby enemies will gain this effect.

conviction.name: Conviction
conviction.description: You fly at the fallen enemy, dealing <dmg>645 damage</dmg> and reducing its movement speed by 20%.

retribution.name: Retribution
retribution.description: When used on an ally, heals the ally.

sacred-verdict.name: Sacred Verdict
sacred-verdict.description:
Deal 407 damage to the enemy and immediately applies 3 stacks of Divine Punishment and 5 stacks of Smash.

The damage will be increased to enemies with Divine Punishment and Smash applied.

execute.name: Execute
execute.description: Attacks the enemy, dealing <dmg>1058 damage</dmg>. Additionally, if the enemy has the <spell>Branded</spell> or <spell>Verdict</spell> effect, the <spell>Smash</spell> effect will also be applied, dealing damage over time for 10 seconds. The smash affect can be stacked up to 5 times to deal continous physical damage..

test.name: test Spell
test.description: Does nothing special just tests some stuff out.
